sentences.en: A skirt worn under another skirt a petticoat.
sentences.cn: 穿在另外一件裙子的外面的裙子.

sentences.en: But there was so much bloodblood on her red petticoat, blood on her black dress and her white veil, blood on the executioner’s shoes, blood all over the floor. Blood, blood everywhere.
sentences.cn: 但却有这么多血鲜血渗到她红色的衬裙上，渗到她黑色的连衣裙和她那白色的纱裙上，鲜血流到了刽子手的鞋上，地板上到处是血，血，到处是血。

sentences.en: I have to wear a petticoat under this skirt to prevent it from riding up when I move.
sentences.cn: 我必须在裙子里面加一条衬裙,以防走动时裙子往上缩.

sentences.en: I'll buy Mammy some red taffeta and have an elegant petticoat made. "
sentences.cn: 我就给嬷嬷买块红府绸,让她做一条漂亮裙子吧.

sentences.en: If this white skirt had a petticoat, I would take it.
sentences.cn: 如果这条白色裙子有一件衬裙, 我就会买下了.

sentences.en: It fell over one side of her dress and caught the white border of a petticoat, just visible as she stood at ease.
sentences.cn: 再往下照到她一侧的衣服和衬裙的花边—只有她随意地站着时才会看到。

sentences.en: It was like living inside a petticoat.
sentences.cn: 我们就像住在衬裙里面.

sentences.en: Petticoat influence is an unhealthy tendency.
sentences.cn: 裙带风是一种不正之风.

sentences.en: She gnawed furiously, tore with both hands and the petticoat lay in strips in her hands.
sentences.cn: 她一次又一次使劲咬呀, 双手撕扯呀,结果衬裙变成了一堆布条摆在眼前.

sentences.en: She purchased a knitted petticoat and sent it to the Thenardiers.
sentences.cn: 她买一条绒线编织的裙,寄给了德纳第.

sentences.en: She stood there, in her red petticoat, with a smile on her face.
sentences.cn: 她站在那里，穿着红色的衬裙，脸上带着微笑。
那件上衣太短,让你的衬裙露出来了.

sentences.en: Then I'll take her a petticoat.
They gave the petticoat to Eponine.
sentences.cn: 他们便把裙子给爱潘妮穿.

sentences.en: This petticoat made the Thenardiers furious.
sentences.cn: 那条裙子把德纳第夫妇弄到怒气冲天.

trans.tran_en: a piece of women’s underwear like a thin skirt or dress that is worn under a skirt or dress
